org.apache.savan.util
Interface UtilFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventingUtilFactory
public interface UtilFactory

Defines a Utility Factory in Savan. Each Protocol will provide its own set of utilities. These utilities will be used in various levels in Savan.
